description:
This additional content includes:

- "Summer Belt" Hunter layered armor piece

Lightweight and durable, yet stylish and summery. This belt has it all!

Hunt in style with this special layered armor!

- Hunter Layered Armor can be used in the Layered Armor Settings menu of the Item Box.
- This item can be equipped to your hunterâ€™s waist.
- Layered armor is a "skin" which changes the appearance of the character without affecting their stats and abilities.
name: "Summer Belt" Hunter layered armor piece
